name: Dinner Tonight: Miso Soup with Grilled Eggplant and Mushrooms
description: A few weeks ago I finally figured out the secret to good miso soup. You can buy miso paste and all the tofu you can stomach, but to get it right you need dashi. I was so amazed by what...
recipeIngredient: 1 Japanese eggplant, or 1/2 regular eggplant, sliced into 1/2 inch thick pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer the vegetables in the dashi for about 10 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender.
Turn off the heat, and stir in the miso and the scallions. Ladle into bowls and serve.
